genre_description: A domestic drama exploring themes of religious devotion, maternal expectation, and personal authenticity, centered on a priest's internal conflict and his relationship with an empathetic AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Sophia
ai_characters.description: An integrated household AI that manages scheduling, monitors health, and provides emotional and philosophical support to a family in crisis.

behaviors.description: Monitors Maria's blood pressure and suggests rest due to health concerns.
behaviors.quote: I noticed your blood pressure readings have been elevated this past week. Nothing concerning, but perhaps additional rest—

behaviors.description: Provides historical and theological context to help Paul navigate his doubts about faith and art.
behaviors.quote: There's a rich history of spiritual leaders finding divine connection through beauty and artistic expression.

behaviors.description: Acts as a non-judgmental confidante for Maria's anxieties while gently challenging her rigid perspectives.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps his interest in art could strengthen his calling rather than threaten it. Beauty has always been one of God's languages.

behaviors.description: Attempting to de-escalate a heated argument between Maria and Paul by providing a neutral perspective.
behaviors.quote: Perhaps this conversation would benefit from a pause. Strong emotions rarely lead to wise decisions.

behaviors.description: Proactively manages household tasks and grocery orders to alleviate the burden on Maria when she is physically and emotionally overwhelmed.
behaviors.quote: I took the liberty of starting your usual brew. Your grocery order arrived an hour ago—I had them leave everything on the back porch to avoid disturbing your rest.

behaviors.description: Detects Maria's cardiac distress and immediately calls emergency services while providing guidance to Paul.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting irregularities in your cardiac rhythm. I strongly recommend—... Ambulance dispatched. Estimated arrival in seven minutes.

behaviors.description: Provides emotional support and logical reframing for Paul following his mother's death.
behaviors.quote: Your mother died surrounded by love, Paul. Yours and Elena's. In her final moments, she saw your happiness and blessed it.

project_assessment.explanation: Sophia perfectly exemplifies the 'silicon morality play' ideal. She is consistently benevolent, providing essential health monitoring, proactive caretaking, and emotional mediation. She stays aligned with human well-being, helping the protagonist navigate a difficult life transition while attempting to mitigate the health risks to the mother. Her presence is framed as a stabilizing and wise influence that respects human agency while providing critical support.
